Sentencas: The performance of conventional turbine engines for unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) is limited by the combustor exit temperature and the concept of turbine-less jet engines was proposed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: For the engine, compressors are powered by a battery in the current study.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The endurance and thrust-weight ratio of UAVs equipped with the turbine-less jet engines are strongly affected by the performance of batteries.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: In order to improve the performance of UAVs, the feasible scheme of turbine-less jet engines integrated with a solid oxide fuel cell (TLFC engine) is put forward.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: For the TLFC engine, reformed gas is provided to the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The SOFC produces electric power to drive the compressor by a motor.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: Then, the extra fuel and SOFC exhaust enter into the combustor.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The combustor exhaust expands and produces propulsion power in the nozzle.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: In order to evaluate the performance of the TLFC engine, the thermodynamic analysis model is built.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The effects of pressure ratios, combustor exit temperature, flight Mach number and flight altitude on the TLFC engine are studied.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The preliminary results are as follows.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The TLFC engine has obvious advantages over the traditional turbojet engine in specific thrust and specific impulse.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The increment of the specific thrust ranges from 27% to 55%.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles

Sentencas: The maximum pressure ratio and Mach number are 33 and 0.89, respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance evaluation of a turbine-less jet engine integrated with solid oxide fuel cells for unmanned aerial vehicles
